last_episode_to_air.name: The Last Day
last_episode_to_air.overview: Frank faces a major breakthrough in his investigation; Erik makes a fateful decision.

name: TWIN
overview: When a young mother is responsible for the accidental death of her husband, she persuades the dead husband's identical twin to take his identity.

episodes.name: First Day
episodes.overview: When a young mother is responsible for the accidental death of her husband, she persuades the dead husbands identical twin to take his identity.

episodes.name: Second Day
episodes.overview: Ingrid fears for her children’s future and puts forth a bold plan to save the family.

episodes.name: Third Day
episodes.overview: Ingrid and Erik try their best to deal with their new life situation, but the plan is already beginning to crack.

episodes.name: Fourth Day
episodes.overview: Erik visits his former girlfriend Mary and is about to reveal everything when he tries to save Karin from drowning.

episodes.name: Fifth Day
episodes.overview: Ingrid tries to push Karin back to what she told the police, and Erik realizes that Adam’s perfect life had many dark sides.

episodes.name: Sixth Day
episodes.overview: The network is intertwined when Karin is called in for a conversation at school, and Erik has to play the role of a dedicated father.

episodes.name: Seventh Day
episodes.overview: Frank gets his suspicions that something is wrong with Ingrid’s family, while Ingrid finds an unexpected supporter.

episodes.name: The Last Day
episodes.overview: Frank faces a major breakthrough in his investigation; Erik makes a fateful decision.
